about_the_game:
Kingdom of Atham is a Fantasy Survival game with RPG aspects! with tons of feature ( please refer to main page for more details ).

But wait now you can almost become a fairy with our "Wing DLC" bringing you 60 different wings in total. Choose and pick from evil wings, fiery wings or even multicoloured wings there is one for everyone! Enhance your look in seconds , look different then others and experience an immersion while diving deeper into a fantasy world!

Enjoy these wings with our other DLC'S

Specific description of package;
6 different styles, each styles with 10 colours to pick from ( Red, Green, Blood, Purple, Blue, Black, Gold, Dark Purple, Light Blue, Rainbow ).

Information;
This package will receive updates and or more content over the course of Kingdom of Atham: Crown of the Champions lifetime.

Does NOT make you fly.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Core I5-7600 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600x or Equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 or Equivalent
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: (Low Settings) SSD Recommended. Requirement are higher during EA development, Performance will be improved overtime!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Core i7 9700k or AMD Ryzen 7 3700x or Equivalent
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2080 or Equivalent
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: (Epic Settings) SSD Recommended. Requirement are higher during EA development, Performance will be improved overtime!

short_description: Kingdom of Atham is a Fantasy Survival game with RPG aspects! But wait now you can almost become a fairy with our "Become a fairy - DLC" bringing you 60 different wings in total. Choose and pick from evil wings, fiery wings or even multicoloured wings there is one for everyone!
